      public Monster(String givenName, int givenDamage, int heal, int cost)
      Instantiates a new Monster.
      Parameters:
      givenName - the name string to set as the monster's name
      givenDamage - integer to set the monster's damage as
      heal - amount monster should heal by
      cost - amount to set as price of monster
